siteMetadata.name: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.title: Talha Enes Ayranci
siteMetadata.description: PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the University of Glasgow.
siteMetadata.about:
I am a second-year PhD student in Computing Science at the University of Glasgow, under the supervision of Dr. Jonathan Grizou and Dr. Mireilla Bikanga Ada. My research focuses on tangible machine learning education.
            
Apart from research, I like writing blogs, watching and playing football and exploring the beautiful places of Scotland. I also have a beginner's level interest in the philosophy of science.
siteMetadata.author: talhayranci

markdownRemark.excerpt: This project represents my MSc dissertation, and it introduces a highly valuable, cost-effective, and engaging system designed to empower smartphones for deep…
markdownRemark.html:
This project represents my MSc dissertation, and it introduces a highly valuable, cost-effective, and engaging system designed to empower smartphones for deep learning and programming education. The project’s core components were developed using JavaScript, encompassing both the environment creation and machine learning model implementation.

Click this link to use the system. Instructions for the system can be found here.

You can find the project repo here, and the dissertation document here for more information.

frontmatter.title: Mobile and Simulation Based Self-Driving Car
